review_blob: A bit bighty, but in a good way. Has a good sour taste, but not overbearing. Makes you pucker up a bit, but then want another sip.
beer_name: Uinta Crooked Line Birthday Suit: 21st Anniversary

review_blob: Nitro version of snow drop is smoother and creamer than co2 version. A must try if available.
A great example of the Flemish sour. One of our favorites from keg, good from bottle. Expensive, but worth it.

Have had on tap at the sandlot and in the bottle. Tap is much more aromatic and flavorful. Bottle is acceptable, but needs to breathe and warm a little to get some aroma and flavor. The horchata flavor is nice when apparent.
Found it on tap in Southern Cal, really enjoyed it. Had a couple of bottles at another establishment which were not quite as good, but still one of my favorites.
